named-query.name: filmesNotaMaiorQue
named-query.query: select distinct f from Filme f join fetch f.atores where f.nota > :nota

named-query.name: filmesNome
named-query.query: select distinct f from Filme f join fetch f.atores where f.nome = :nome

named-native-query.name: obterMediaFilmes
named-native-query.query: select avg(nota) as media from filmes
